text:
Regen und Wind,
vergess nicht den Schirm,
die Tropfen sind firm

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
am i on radio?

Siehst du den Schnee,
ist er glitzernd wie Klee?
Utere tuo studio!

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a curio

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat
